main_definition: Fought refers to a conflict or struggle in which two parties engage against each other, often involving physical combat.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have engaged in battle or conflict with someone/something.
meanings_and_examples.example: The soldiers fought bravely against the enemy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A dispute or disagreement between two parties that escalates to physical confrontation.
meanings_and_examples.example: The neighbors fought over a property boundary line.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To struggle with something challenging in order to achieve an objective.
meanings_and_examples.example: She had to fight through her fear of public speaking to deliver the presentation.
